physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 6 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''1907 Sam Greenwald, Sam Golanty, ? Shachet, ? Stein, Sara Morris, Dora Gardenschwartz, Ida Cohen, Phil Francis, Izzie Greenwald, Louis Cook, Susie Sigman, Sarah Karsh; Cheltenham School, 8th Grade 1907, Principal Wm. Knapp, Teacher Miss Weymouth.'' Handwritten note with photograph: ''#21, 8th Grade Class of Cheltenham School, circa 1910, donated by Mr. Louis Cook; Some of the class: Principal Wm. Knapp, Teacher Miss Weymouth. Not in any order: Sam Greenwald, Sam Golanty, ? Shachet, ? Stein, Sara Morris, Dora Gardenschwartz, Si Mintz, Rod Goldberg, Ida Cohen, Phil Francis, Louis Cook, Sara Karsh, Rose Levy, Conrad Echstein, Lillian Neulander, Stella Webber, Susie Sigman, Izzie Greenwald.''

mods.abstract: The members of the 8th grade class at Cheltenham School sit on the steps of the school located at the corner of Irving Street and West Colfax Avenue in Denver, Colorado. Many of the Jewish children living in the West Colfax neighborhood went to Cheltenham School. The students include Sam Greenwald, Sam Golanty, ? Shachet, ? Stein, Sara Morris, Dora Gardenschwartz, Ida Cohen, Phil Francis, Izzie Greenwald, Louis Cook, Susie Sigman, Sarah Karsh, Si Mintz, Rod Goldberg, Rose Levy, Conrad Echstein, Lillian Neulander, Stella Webber as well as Principal William Knapp and teacher Miss Weymouth.
mods.note: Copy donated by Louis Cook, a student in the class.
